A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow what a massive turd. I can't believe this film has been released. Is it supposed to be for fans of the franchise because if so it misses the mark by a long shot. It undoes all the good work of the Force Awakens and leaves you with a mish mash of a film. Luke Skywalker deserved better. Shouts to Admiral Ackbar and Phasma.
